item.huanle.green_dragon_sword.desc: Poison an enemy for 5 seconds when it hits
item.huanle.green_dragon_sword.desc2: 20% chance to gain a Brief Boost
item.huanle.green_dragon_sword.desc3: Regenerate 10% of the attack after hitting 2 health
item.huanle.sun_god_sword.desc: Right-click to unleash the power of the sun
item.huanle.sun_god_sword.desc2: Deal 5 damage, range is 16x16 blocks, and burn entities
item.huanle.throwing_axe.charge: Press and hold the right button to charge, the longer the charge time, the farther the throw distance
enchantment.huanle.lightning_strike.desc: Strikes lightning when attacking entities, higher levels summon more lightning bolts. Can be applied to swords, tridents and axes
enchantment.huanle.quick_draw.desc: Reduces bow drawing time by 0.3 seconds per level
item.huanle.ender_sword.desc2: 20% chance to deal extra damage and apply the Weaken buff to the target
advancements.huanle.ender_sword.title: Ender Sword
advancements.huanle.sun_god_sword.title: Sun God Sword
item.huanle.flame_bow.desc: Can only be shot with flaming arrows
advancements.huanle.flame_bow.title: Flame Archer
advancements.huanle.huanle_sword.title: Sword of Finality
advancements.huanle.root.title: The discoverer of the Magic Crystal
item.huanle.lava_sword.desc: Sets entities on fire when attacked
advancements.huanle.lava_sword.title: Lava Swordsman
item.huanle.moonlight_sword.desc: Right-click to fire a blue arc and cool it down for 2 seconds
item.huanle.moonlight_sword.desc2: Arc hits inflict frostbite for 10 seconds
item.huanle.moon_crescent_sword.desc: Handheld to gain a resistance-up effect
item.huanle.moon_crescent_sword.desc2: Attacking the target causes the target to gain the slow effect
effect.huanle.freezing.desc: Slows movement speed by 30% per level and deals 0.5 magic damage over time
item.huanle.blue_flame_sword.desc2: Increases the target's burn duration by 5 seconds on hit
item.huanle.blue_flame_sword.desc3: Deals 4x damage to targets on fire
item.huanle.ender_hammer.desc: A hammer infused with the power of the End
advancements.huanle.ender_hammer.title: Ender Crusher
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc: Gain Regeneration I when held underwater
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc2: 30% chance to apply Wither II for 5 seconds
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc3: 3% chance to restore full health when attacking
item.huanle.forest_blade.desc4: Crouching and right-clicking consumes 10 health in exchange for the Strength II buff for 10 seconds
advancements.huanle.forest_blade.title: Guardian of the Forest
item.huanle.death_scythe.desc: Absorbs 4 health points from enemies on hit
item.huanle.death_scythe.desc2: 5% chance to trigger Bleeding effect (reduces current health by 30% and causes continuous damage)
item.huanle.death_scythe.desc3: Sneak + Right-click to consume 10 health points and apply Wither II to enemies for 8 seconds
advancements.huanle.death_scythe.title: Death Reaper
item.huanle.looting_dagger.desc: Comes with Looting V enchantment, increasing drop rates
advancements.huanle.looting_dagger.title: Looter
item.huanle.fire_god_dagger.desc2: Sets entities on fire for 10 seconds when hit
advancements.huanle.lava_ingot.title: Molten Metal
advancements.huanle.fire_god_ingot.title: Fire God's Essence
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.desc: Right-click to teleport 8 blocks away (cooldown for 5 seconds).
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.desc2: Right-click crouch to switch form (cooldown 60 seconds)
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.desc3: Gain Strength II and Speed II for 30 seconds when switching forms
item.huanle.awakened_dragon_hunter_sword: The blade comes with an ender particle effect
20% chance to deal extra damage and inflict Weakness
Right-click to apply glow to entities within a 20x20 radius (cooldown 60 seconds).
Attacks glowing entities deal double damage
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.transfor: You transformed back to normal form.
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.teleport: Teleport skill on cooldown, %s seconds remaining...
item.huanle.dragon_hunter_sword.glow_coo: Glow skill on cooldown, %s seconds remaining...
item.huanle.flame_god_axe.desc: A powerful axe forged with the essence of flame
item.huanle.flame_god_pickaxe.desc: A powerful pickaxe forged with the essence of flame
item.huanle.flame_god_hoe.desc: A powerful hoe forged with the essence of flame
item.huanle.flame_god_shovel.desc: A powerful shovel forged with the essence of flame
item.huanle.magic_crystal_apple.desc: §6Consuming this apple gives you multiple buffs
effect.huanle.fear.desc: Prevents all forms of health regeneration, including from food, regeneration effects, and instant health. At level II or higher, also prevents food saturation recovery
